1507270.name: Grab Toy
1507270.description:
In an ordinary children's room, the toys come to life and have a happy time every day, but an evil wizard doll is always causing trouble, the daring Dino the Dinosaur, has to work with the rest of the toys to stop him!
Drag and reorder the blocks to climb up and reach the goal, Grab Toy offer more than 30 unique and fun puzzle levels to solve! With a variety of challenges, character customization, and impressive graphics. Grab Toy offer fun for all ages
